title: Very Profitable Web Hosting Business
text: Questions Business Summary Serving over 800 corporate clients, this company is in the dedicated server sector of the internet hosting industry, providing ''bare metal'' servers for those who have outgrown cloud and shared hosting. This is an extremely stable and solid part of the market, as in the end, everything on the internet runs on a bare metal server if you drill down deep enough. The industry is in a shift towards cloud-everything. This company is very well positioned at the value end of the sector, offering extremely attractive pricing. Sales are on the increase which is expected to continue for the next several years at least. Here are some highlights. - Redundant fiber optic connections - Over 4,500 sq ft (450 mï¿½) battery room. All servers are powered from the power room 24/7, so power grid outages never affect the data center - World-class temperature control - Unsurpassed uptime. The best in the industry. - Secure swipe-card controlled access - 24/7/365 Security Personnel Seller will finance up to $1,250,000 for a qualified purchaser. Seller will also be available post-sale to assist new owner is a successful transition. This business is turn-key with established customer & supplier relationships, management & key employees, equipment, processes, infrastructure and a built-in mentor. Financials
